name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-graph-toolkit-nodejs
title: Teams tab with microsoft graph toolkit
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates a Microsoft Teams tab using the Microsoft Graph Toolkit to create interactive and collaborative web experiences.
longDescription: This demo showcases a Microsoft Teams tab built with the Microsoft Graph Toolkit, featuring components like a sign-in card and various interactive elements. It allows users to easily integrate and display Microsoft 365 data, enhancing collaboration within Teams.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing teams tab with microsoft graph toolkit

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
